subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) institutional capacity building , (2)   policy and legislative reforms, (2) border control (3) stockpile management (4) small arms survey and (5) implementation of  community development projects.
subproject.title: Arms for Development 2

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: The Arms for Development seeks to enhance a national strategy for sustainable small arms control in Sierra Leone. Key areas of intervention include: 1) implementation of community development projects as incentive for voluntary surrender of weapons  (2) stockpile management (3) institutional capacity building and (4) border control
subproject.title: Capacity Bldg for Communitees
